3. Visit shopping centers: Graz has several shopping centers, including the Shopping City Seiersberg, which is one of the largest in Austria. These centers offer a wide range of international and local brands, as well as restaurants and cafes.
4. Go to traditional shops: If you're looking for traditional products, such as clothing or handicrafts, then head to the traditional shops in Graz's old town. These shops are usually smaller and specialize in unique products that you won't find anywhere else.
5. Join a shopping tour: If you're short on time, then consider joining a shopping tour. These tours will take you around the best shopping areas in Graz and provide insights into the city's culture and history.
